Confessione generale

Fra. Raffaelle, Confessione generale [et] modo vtilisimo per confessarse fata el reuerendo miser Fra Raphael.

Venice: Matteo Capcasa (di Codeca), ca. 1495
8vo (14 cm). [a⁸]. [16]leaves. Watermark on a₁ and a₄
ISTC ir00004500 Goff Suppl. R4a; Goff Suppl. R4a; GW M3703920

 

Shelf-mark:   Summerfield B1625
Provenance:   Unknown
Binding:   Not identified
Annotations:   None
Decoration:   Title in Gothic letters; Woodcut of confessor and penitent on a₁ captioned “ATENDE TIBI”
Imperfections:   None identified
